node.title: 15yo girl arrested, two teenagers injured after falling from car roof in school car park
node.description: Two teenagers are injured after falling from the roof of a car they were riding on in a school car park, South Australia PoliceÂ say.
node.content: ["A teenage girl is in hospital and another has been arrested after\u00a0a crash at Paralowie in Adelaide's north\u00a0last night.", "Police and ambulance crews were called to the Paralowie R-12 School\u00a0car park on Whites Road\u00a0about 10:00pm.", "A 13-year-old girl was taken to the Women's and Children's Hospital with serious injuries, while\u00a0a 16-year-old boy suffered minor injuries.", "It will be alleged the pair were\u00a0riding on the roof of a grey Mitsubishi Lancer when they fell off.", "A 15-year-old girl from Salisbury North was charged with causing harm by dangerous driving and driving unlicensed.", "Resident Bob Wood said it was concerning.", "\"That's not very nice, I'm sorry for the child getting hit, but what are they doing that time of night?\" he said.", "\"That's the biggest problem I've got.\"", "Ken Brown, who dropped his nephew at school this morning, said such behaviour was unacceptable.", "\"It's disgusting, they need to do something about it,\" he said.", "\"They should throw the book at them and they should never be allowed to drive a car again. [There's] too much of this going on, to be honest.\"", "Major crash officers attended the scene and are investigating.", "SA Police said the teenage girl who was charged\u00a0was bailed to appear in the Elizabeth Youth Court\u00a0in January.", "The car involved in the incident was towed from the scene.", "Anyone who witnessed the car driving in the area around on Wednesday night is\u00a0asked to contact Crime Stoppers."]
